title: Can you Believe in God? Peterson, Jung, Nietzsche, Vervaeke, Keller, Piper, Pageau
description:
JBP says you dare not say you believe in God. Really? Can you believe in God at all in the modern world? Why and why not? Can this address the meaning crisis? Lots of stuff in this one. 

JBP https://youtu.be/MnUfXYGtT5Q
Glen Scrivener https://youtu.be/iwF98r_aocQ
Boghossian and McGrew Unbelievable https://www.premierchristianradio.com/Shows/Saturday/Unbelievable/Episodes/Peter-Boghossian-vs-Tim-McGrew-A-manual-for-creating-atheists
Frank Schaeffer Crazy for God https://www.amazon.com/Crazy-God-Elect-Helped-Religious-ebook/dp/B003K1552E
Stan Vander Klay Chains of Grace https://www.amazon.com/Chains-Grace-Stan-VanderKlay/dp/1419633155
